slide.title: A polling centre in Kaharol upazila of Dinajpur gives a deserted look at around 12:30pm. Photos: Our District Correspondents
Indigenous women stand in a queue to cast their votes at Khagrachhari Gachhban Junior Secondary School centre. Photo: Banglar Chokh

Septuagenarian Aleya Begum has a look of despair in front of Gouranadi Pilot High School centre in Barisal as someone had cast her vote before her arrival at the centre at around 3:00pm. Photos: Our District Correspondents
Yasuharu Sindhu, chief of the political wing at Japan's embassy, visits Polash Pilot High School centre in Narsingdi. Photos: Our District Correspondents
Naldanga Bhusan Pilot High School centre in Kaliganj upazila of Jhenidah sees no voter at around 9:00am. Photos: Our District Correspondents
Women voters wait in a long queue for their turn at Mirersarai High School centre in Mirersarai upazila of Chittagong. Photos: Our District Correspondents
US Ambassador Dan W Mozena talks to voters and army personnel at Basantakedar Government Primary School centre in Mohanpur upazila of Rajshahi. Photo: Banglar Chokh
Women voters queue up at Dhunat Girls' High School centre in Dhunat upazila of Bogra yesterday. Photos: Our District Correspondents
